headlines.description: Manchester City made it 11 wins in a row as Rodri scored a 93rd minute winner to see off 10-man Arsenal 2-1 in a chaotic start to 2022.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rodri's injury time winner puts Man City 11 clear

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur's top four bid was boosted by a 1-0 win at relegation threatend Watford as Davinson Sanchez scored a 96th minute winner.
headlines.shortLinkText: Late Sanchez strike hands Tottenham vital win

events.name: West Ham United at Crystal Palace

headlines.description: — Manuel Lanzini scored twice before West Ham held off a late fightback from Crystal Palace to win 3-2 in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lanzini’s double leads West Ham to 3-2 win at Crystal Palace
